detaileddescription.para: Similar to initialization/1 , but allows specifying when Goal is executed while loading the program-text:

para.verbatim:
+ now Execute _Goal_ immediately.
+ after_load Execute _Goal_ after loading program-text. This is the same as @ref initialization/1 .
+ restore Do not execute _Goal_ while loading the program, but only when restoring a state (not implemented yet).
